instructions: Image titled Turn Off iCloud Music Library Step 1 1 Open your iPhone's Image titled Iphonesettingsappicon.png Settings. Tap the Settings app icon, which resembles a grey box with a set of gears on it. Image titled Turn Off iCloud Music Library Step 2 2 Scroll down and tap . You'll find this option near the middle of the Settings page. Image titled Turn Off iCloud Music Library Step 3 3 Tap the green "iCloud Music Library" switch Image titled Iphoneswitchonicon1.png . It's near the top of the screen. The switch will turn grey Image titled Iphoneswitchofficon.png . If you don't see an "iCloud Music Library" option here, you don't have an Apple Music subscription and thus cannot turn off (or on) iCloud Music Library. Image titled Turn Off iCloud Music Library Step 4 4 Tap when prompted. Doing so confirms your decision and turns off iCloud Music Library. Your Apple Music will be deleted from your iPhone; you can re-download it at any time by turning back on iCloud Music Library. Advertisement
